questions.question: This man famously asked "Et tu, Brute" as he was murdered.
Lawrence Oates, who uttered "I may be some time" before leaving the Scott Expedition's camp and never being seen again, was on an expedition to this place.
When asked by a priest to renounce Satan, this man famously said "this is no time for making enemies".
Lee Harvey Oswald famously said these last words to a Dallas Policeman.
This was the last thing Graham Chapman said to his adopted son.
